casebody.data:
SPECTRUM SCIENCES & SOFTWARE, INC., Appellant, v. Lawrence J. DELANEY, Acting Secretary of the Air Force, Appellee. No. 00-1259. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 3, 2001.

Before MICHEL, LOURIE, and RADER, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
